foreignData.name: Urquell
foreignData.text:
Wenn der Urquell ins Spiel kommt, übernimm die Kontrolle über das verzauberte Land.
Du verlierst die Kontrolle über das verzauberte Land am Ende jedes Deiner Züge.
Du erhältst die Kontrolle über das verzauberte Land zu Beginn jedes Deiner Züge.

name: Wellspring
originalText:
When Wellspring comes into play, gain control of enchanted land.
At the end of each of your turns, lose control of enchanted land.
At the beginning of each of your turns, gain control of enchanted land.

rulings.text: If Wellspring leaves the battlefield, the control effect still lasts until end of turn.

text:
Enchant land
When Wellspring enters the battlefield, gain control of enchanted land until end of turn.
At the beginning of your upkeep, untap enchanted land. You gain control of that land until end of turn.
